description: This file defines a tool function 'answer_from_known_questions' that answers questions based on a predefined FAQ and interacts with an Agent object, including session state management and printing responses.

classes.name: Answer
classes.description: A Pydantic model class used to structure the answer and original question.

methods.name: answer_from_known_questions
methods.description: A tool function that answers questions from a predefined FAQ or indicates lack of knowledge.
